snippet: TheStreet has agreed to acquire The Deal, publisher of a longtime bible of the mergers industry, from the investment firm that manages money for the estate of the late Bruce Wasserstein and other investors.
abstract: TheStreet has agreed to acquire The Deal, publisher of a longtime bible of the mergers industry, from the investment firm that manages money for the estate of the late Bruce Wasserstein and other investors.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: TheStreet to Buy The Deal for $5.8 Million
